name: Pool
description: Pool contract. To be covered by a proxy contract, owned by the PoolAddressesProvider of the specific marketAll admin functions are callable by the PoolConfigurator contract defined also in the PoolAddressesProvider*. Main point of interaction with an Aave protocol's market - Users can: # Supply # Withdraw # Borrow # Repay # Swap their loans between variable and stable rate # Enable/disable their supplied assets as collateral rebalance stable rate borrow positions # Liquidate positions # Execute Flash Loans.

eventDecorators.name: Borrow
eventDecorators.description: Emitted on borrow() and flashLoan() when debt needs to be opened.

eventDecorators.name: LiquidationCall
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a borrower is liquidated.

eventDecorators.name: MintedToTreasury
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the protocol treasury receives minted aTokens from the accrued interest.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: - The relayer address to be added or removed.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: - The relayer address to be added or removed.

eventDecorators.name: ReserveDataUpdated
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the state of a reserve is updated.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: - The relayer address to be added or removed.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: - The relayer address to be added or removed.

eventDecorators.name: UserEModeSet
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when the user selects a certain asset category for eMode.

parameterDecorators.name: caller
parameterDecorators.description: - The account that called the function.

parameterDecorators.name: relayer
parameterDecorators.description: - The relayer address to be added or removed.

functionDecorators.name: BRIDGE_PROTOCOL_FEE
functionDecorators.description: Returns the part of the bridge fees sent to protocol.

returnDecorators.description: The bridge fee sent to the protocol.

functionDecorators.name: FLASHLOAN_PREMIUM_TOTAL
functionDecorators.description: Returns the total fee on flash loans.

functionDecorators.name: FLASHLOAN_PREMIUM_TO_PROTOCOL
functionDecorators.description: Returns the part of the flashloan fees sent to protocol.

returnDecorators.description: The flashloan fee sent to the protocol.

functionDecorators.name: MAX_NUMBER_RESERVES
functionDecorators.description: Returns the maximum number of reserves supported to be listed in this Pool.

returnDecorators.description: The maximum number of reserves supported.

functionDecorators.name: MAX_STABLE_RATE_BORROW_SIZE_PERCENT
functionDecorators.description: Returns the percentage of available liquidity that can be borrowed at once at stable rate.

returnDecorators.description: The percentage of available liquidity to borrow.

functionDecorators.name: backUnbacked
functionDecorators.description: Back the current unbacked underlying with `amount` and pay `fee`.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to back.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to back.

parameterDecorators.name: fee
parameterDecorators.description: The amount paid in fees*.

functionDecorators.name: borrow
functionDecorators.description: Allows users to borrow a specific `amount` of the reserve underlying asset, provided that the borrower already supplied enough collateral, or he was given enough allowance by a credit delegator on the corresponding debt token (StableDebtToken or VariableDebtToken) - E.g. User borrows 100 USDC passing as `onBehalfOf` his own address, receiving the 100 USDC in his wallet and 100 stable/variable debt tokens, depending on the `interestRateMode`.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to borrow.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: interestRateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The interest rate mode at which the user wants to borrow: 1 for Stable, 2 for Variable.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: The code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user who will receive the debt. Should be the address of the borrower itself calling the function if he wants to borrow against his own collateral, or the address of the credit delegator if he has been given credit delegation allowance*.

functionDecorators.name: configureEModeCategory
functionDecorators.description: Configures a new category for the eMode. In eMode, the protocol allows very high borrowing power to borrow assets of the same category. The category 0 is reserved as it's the default for volatile assets.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the category.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the category.

functionDecorators.name: deposit
functionDecorators.description: Supplies an `amount` of underlying asset into the reserve, receiving in return overlying aTokens. - E.g. User supplies 100 USDC and gets in return 100 aUSDC. Deprecated: mantained for compatibilty purposes.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to supply.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be supplied.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the aTokens, same as msg.sender if the user wants to receive them on his own wallet, or a different address if the beneficiary of aTokens is a different wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: Code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man*.

functionDecorators.name: dropReserve
functionDecorators.description: Drop a reserve. Only callable by the PoolConfigurator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve*.

functionDecorators.name: finalizeTransfer
functionDecorators.description: Validates and finalizes an aToken transfer. Only callable by the overlying aToken of the `asset`.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the aToken.

parameterDecorators.name: from
parameterDecorators.description: The user from which the aTokens are transferred.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The user receiving the aTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount being transferred/withdrawn.

parameterDecorators.name: balanceFromBefore
parameterDecorators.description: The aToken balance of the `from` user before the transfer.

parameterDecorators.name: balanceToBefore
parameterDecorators.description: The aToken balance of the `to` user before the transfer.

functionDecorators.name: flashLoan
functionDecorators.description: Allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. IMPORTANT There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com.

parameterDecorators.name: receiverAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contract receiving the funds, implementing the IFlashLoanReceiver interface.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The addresses of the assets being flash-borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amounts
parameterDecorators.description: The amounts of the assets being flash-borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: modes
parameterDecorators.description: Types of the debt to open if the flash loan is not returned: 0 -> Don't open any debt, just revert if funds can't be transferred from the receiver 1 -> Open debt at stable rate for the value of the amount flash-borrowed to the `onBehalfOf` address 2 -> Open debt at variable rate for the value of the amount flash-borrowed to the `onBehalfOf` address.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the debt in the case of using on `modes` 1 or 2.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: Variadic packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: The code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man*.

functionDecorators.name: flashLoanSimple
functionDecorators.description: Allows smartcontracts to access the liquidity of the pool within one transaction, as long as the amount taken plus a fee is returned. IMPORTANT There are security concerns for developers of flashloan receiver contracts that must be kept into consideration. For further details please visit https://developers.aave.com.

parameterDecorators.name: receiverAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the contract receiving the funds, implementing the IFlashLoanSimpleReceiver interface.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the asset being flash-borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount of the asset being flash-borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: params
parameterDecorators.description: Variadic packed params to pass to the receiver as extra information.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: The code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man*.

functionDecorators.name: getAddressesProvider
functionDecorators.description: Returns the cached PoolAddressesProvider connected to this contract.

functionDecorators.name: getConfiguration
functionDecorators.description: Returns the configuration of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

functionDecorators.name: getEModeCategoryData
functionDecorators.description: Returns the data of an eMode category.

parameterDecorators.name: id
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the category.

returnDecorators.description: The configuration data of the category.

functionDecorators.name: getReserveData
functionDecorators.description: Returns the state and configuration of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

functionDecorators.name: getReserveNormalizedIncome
functionDecorators.description: Returns the normalized income normalized income of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

functionDecorators.name: getReserveNormalizedVariableDebt
functionDecorators.description: Returns the normalized variable debt per unit of asset.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

functionDecorators.name: getReservesList
functionDecorators.description: Returns the list of the initialized reserves. It does not include dropped reserves.

functionDecorators.name: getUserAccountData
functionDecorators.description: Returns the user account data across all the reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user.

returnDecorators.name: totalCollateralBase
returnDecorators.description: The total collateral of the user in the base currency used by the price feed.

returnDecorators.name: totalDebtBase
returnDecorators.description: The total debt of the user in the base currency used by the price feed.

returnDecorators.name: availableBorrowsBase
returnDecorators.description: The borrowing power left of the user in the base currency used by the price feed.

returnDecorators.name: currentLiquidationThreshold
returnDecorators.description: The liquidation threshold of the user.

returnDecorators.name: ltv
returnDecorators.description: The loan to value of The user.

returnDecorators.name: healthFactor
returnDecorators.description: The current health factor of the user*.

functionDecorators.name: getUserConfiguration
functionDecorators.description: Returns the configuration of the user across all the reserves.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The user address.

functionDecorators.name: getUserEMode
functionDecorators.description: Returns the eMode the user is using.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user.

functionDecorators.name: initReserve
functionDecorators.description: Initializes a reserve, activating it, assigning an aToken and debt tokens and an interest rate strategy. Only callable by the PoolConfigurator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: aTokenAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the aToken that will be assigned to the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: stableDebtAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the StableDebtToken that will be assigned to the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: variableDebtAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the VariableDebtToken that will be assigned to the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: interestRateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the interest rate strategy contract*.

functionDecorators.name: initialize
functionDecorators.description: Initializes the Pool. Function is invoked by the proxy contract when the Pool contract is added to the PoolAddressesProvider of the market.Caching the address of the PoolAddressesProvider in order to reduce gas consumption on subsequent operations.

parameterDecorators.name: provider
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the PoolAddressesProvider*.

functionDecorators.name: liquidationCall
functionDecorators.description: Function to liquidate a non-healthy position collateral-wise, with Health Factor below 1 - The caller (liquidator) covers `debtToCover` amount of debt of the user getting liquidated, and receives a proportionally amount of the `collateralAsset` plus a bonus to cover market risk.

parameterDecorators.name: collateralAsset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset used as collateral, to receive as result of the liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: debtAsset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying borrowed asset to be repaid with the liquidation.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrower getting liquidated.

parameterDecorators.name: debtToCover
parameterDecorators.description: The debt amount of borrowed `asset` the liquidator wants to cover.

parameterDecorators.name: receiveAToken
parameterDecorators.description: True if the liquidators wants to receive the collateral aTokens, `false` if he wants to receive the underlying collateral asset directly*.

functionDecorators.name: mintToTreasury
functionDecorators.description: Mints the assets accrued through the reserve factor to the treasury in the form of aTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: assets
parameterDecorators.description: The list of reserves for which the minting needs to be executed*.

functionDecorators.name: mintUnbacked
functionDecorators.description: Mints an `amount` of aTokens to the `onBehalfOf`.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to mint.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to mint.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the aTokens.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: Code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man*.

functionDecorators.name: rebalanceStableBorrowRate
functionDecorators.description: Rebalances the stable interest rate of a user to the current stable rate defined on the reserve. - Users can be rebalanced if the following conditions are satisfied: 1. Usage ratio is above 95% 2. the current supply APY is below REBALANCE_UP_THRESHOLD * maxVariableBorrowRate, which means that too much has been borrowed at a stable rate and suppliers are not earning enough.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: user
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user to be rebalanced*.

functionDecorators.name: repay
functionDecorators.description: Repays a borrowed `amount` on a specific reserve, burning the equivalent debt tokens owned - E.g. User repays 100 USDC, burning 100 variable/stable debt tokens of the `onBehalfOf` address.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `debtMode`.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 1 for Stable, 2 for Variable.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user who will get his debt reduced/removed. Should be the address of the user calling the function if he wants to reduce/remove his own debt, or the address of any other other borrower whose debt should be removed.

functionDecorators.name: repayWithATokens
functionDecorators.description: Repays a borrowed `amount` on a specific reserve using the reserve aTokens held by the repayer, burning the equivalent debt tokens - E.g. User repays 100 USDC using 100 aUSDC, burning 100 variable/stable debt tokens of the `onBehalfOf` address.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `debtMode`.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 1 for Stable, 2 for Variable.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the user who will get his debt reduced/removed. Should be the address of the user calling the function if he wants to reduce/remove his own debt, or the address of any other other borrower whose debt should be removed.

functionDecorators.name: repayWithPermit
functionDecorators.description: Repay with transfer approval of asset to be repaid done via permit function see: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2612 and https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-713.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the borrowed underlying asset previously borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to repay - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to repay the whole debt for `asset` on the specific `debtMode`.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The interest rate mode at of the debt the user wants to repay: 1 for Stable, 2 for Variable.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: Address of the user who will get his debt reduced/removed. Should be the address of the user calling the function if he wants to reduce/remove his own debt, or the address of any other other borrower whose debt should be removed.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: permitV
parameterDecorators.description: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig.

parameterDecorators.name: permitR
parameterDecorators.description: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig.

parameterDecorators.name: permitS
parameterDecorators.description: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig.

functionDecorators.name: setConfiguration
functionDecorators.description: Sets the configuration bitmap of the reserve as a whole. Only callable by the PoolConfigurator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: configuration
parameterDecorators.description: The new configuration bitmap*.

functionDecorators.name: setReserveInterestRateStrategyAddress
functionDecorators.description: Updates the address of the interest rate strategy contract. Only callable by the PoolConfigurator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset of the reserve.

parameterDecorators.name: rateStrategyAddress
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the interest rate strategy contract*.

functionDecorators.name: setUserEMode
functionDecorators.description: Allows a user to use the protocol in eMode.

parameterDecorators.name: categoryId
parameterDecorators.description: The id of the category.

functionDecorators.name: setUserUseReserveAsCollateral
functionDecorators.description: Allows suppliers to enable/disable a specific supplied asset as collateral.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset supplied.

parameterDecorators.name: useAsCollateral
parameterDecorators.description: True if the user wants to use the supply as collateral, false otherwise*.

functionDecorators.name: supplyWithPermit
functionDecorators.description: Supply with transfer approval of asset to be supplied done via permit function see: https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-2612 and https://eips.ethereum.org/EIPS/eip-713.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to supply.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The amount to be supplied.

parameterDecorators.name: onBehalfOf
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the aTokens, same as msg.sender if the user wants to receive them on his own wallet, or a different address if the beneficiary of aTokens is a different wallet.

parameterDecorators.name: referralCode
parameterDecorators.description: Code used to register the integrator originating the operation, for potential rewards. 0 if the action is executed directly by the user, without any middle-man.

parameterDecorators.name: deadline
parameterDecorators.description: The deadline timestamp that the permit is valid.

parameterDecorators.name: permitV
parameterDecorators.description: The V parameter of ERC712 permit sig.

parameterDecorators.name: permitR
parameterDecorators.description: The R parameter of ERC712 permit sig.

parameterDecorators.name: permitS
parameterDecorators.description: The S parameter of ERC712 permit sig*.

functionDecorators.name: swapBorrowRateMode
functionDecorators.description: Allows a borrower to swap his debt between stable and variable mode, or viceversa.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset borrowed.

parameterDecorators.name: rateMode
parameterDecorators.description: The rate mode that the user wants to swap to*.

functionDecorators.name: updateBridgeProtocolFee
functionDecorators.description: Updates the protocol fee on the bridging.

parameterDecorators.name: bridgeProtocolFee
parameterDecorators.description: The part of the premium sent to protocol.

functionDecorators.name: updateFlashloanPremiums
functionDecorators.description: Updates flash loan premiums. Flash loan premium consist in 2 parts - A part is sent to aToken holders as extra balance - A part is collected by the protocol reserves. Only callable by the PoolConfigurator contract.

parameterDecorators.name: flashLoanPremiumTotal
parameterDecorators.description: The total premium in bps.

parameterDecorators.name: flashLoanPremiumToProtocol
parameterDecorators.description: The part of the premium sent to protocol.

functionDecorators.name: withdraw
functionDecorators.description: Withdraws an `amount` of underlying asset from the reserve, burning the equivalent aTokens owned E.g. User has 100 aUSDC, calls withdraw() and receives 100 USDC, burning the 100 aUSDC.

parameterDecorators.name: asset
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the underlying asset to withdraw.

parameterDecorators.name: amount
parameterDecorators.description: The underlying amount to be withdrawn - Send the value type(uint256).max in order to withdraw the whole aToken balance.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the underlying, same as msg.sender if the user wants to receive it on his own wallet, or a different address if the beneficiary is a different wallet.
